title: When presented with picking Yasuo or Riven

replies.body:
dam, i was hoping to keep the memory of this buried deep, thanks now i gota live with the disappointment again

upvoted anyways cuz its true...
i tried so hard to jump off the ledge when i finally got there

Lol He says fuck both sides then picks chaos. 

Meanwhile the rest of us in Order

https://68.media.tumblr.com/b44ae2638a724663318b6dbc08e94beb/tumblr_nogwkkZEqz1ttu8odo1_500.gif

SPOILER for ME3 incoming









Yes but did order get the super secret ending that was bearable? Fuck both sides, if I can't chose none of the above then I will go with the next best thing. The one where the shit storm maybe works out in my preference.
